citations.narrative:
There are three adult dogs in the facility that were not listed on an APHIS form 7005. One of the dogs was born at the
kennel and did not have any identification. Two other dogs had been received from outside sources. There were also no
7006s available for the dogs that had been received from outside of the facility.
An accurate animal inventory is required so that USDA inspectors can ensure all animals are accounted for and receiving
adequate veterinary care. Records of animal acquisition and disposition, including births and deaths, must be kept by the
facility to ensure animals can be traced in case of an animal disease outbreak and to ensure there are not high mortality
rates in the animals.
Each breeder shall use Record of Acquisition and Dogs and Cats on Hand (APHIS Form 7005) and Record of Disposition
of Dogs and Cats (APHIS Form 7006) to make, keep, and maintain the information required by paragraph (a)(1) of section
2.75 (a)(1).
Correction Date: October 14th, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(2) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There are three adult dogs in the facility that were not listed on an APHIS form 7005. One of the dogs was born at the 
kennel and did not have any identification. Two other dogs had been received from outside sources. There were also no 
7006s available for the dogs that had been received from outside of the facility.  
An accurate animal inventory is required so that USDA inspectors can ensure all animals are accounted for and receiving 
adequate veterinary care. Records of animal acquisition and disposition, including births and deaths, must be kept by the 
facility to ensure animals can be traced in case of an animal disease outbreak and to ensure there are not high mortality 
rates in the animals. 
Each breeder shall use Record of Acquisition and Dogs and Cats on Hand (APHIS Form 7005) and Record of Disposition 
of Dogs and Cats (APHIS Form 7006) to make, keep, and maintain the information required by paragraph (a)(1) of section 
2.75 (a)(1). 
Correction Date: October 14th, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
